title: Campsites Cambridgeshire have loads to offer
text:
Travel Articles | July 2, 2015 
First of all, the very word camping evokes childhood memories of summer vacations when you and your friends and family would pitch a tent in the village greens and enjoy sleeping in tents, making campfires, going for hiking or cycling. You would look forward to such activities during your vacations. But today, your children may not be so lucky but, you can still give them a feel of outdoor life by going for caravanning Cambridge. 
The very word camping evokes childhood memories of summer vacations when you and your friends and family would pitch a tent in the village greens and enjoy sleeping in tents, making campfires, going for hiking or cycling. You would look forward to such activities during your vacations. But today, your children may not be so lucky but, you can still give them a feel of outdoor life by going for caravanning Cambridge. There are many campsites Cambridgeshire where caravans, tents or lodges can be booked for staying. Caravan parks offer various facilities where you can either book a pitching space to park your own caravan or hire a mobile home. The campsites provide a safe and secure environment for camping.Campsites Cambridgeshire are located either on open valleys or beside rivers and lakes. They offer great views and you can spend long hours outdoors enjoying pristine nature from close quarters. Those fond of outdoor adventures will love spending their holidays in caravans which provide a very different ambience than a regular hotel. A well-established caravan park has sites suitable for all income groups and caters to varied tastes as some might be looking for a relaxed vacation while others wish to pack in lots of activities. Along with caravanning Cambridge your family can indulge in activities based around the river banks, where the campsite is situated.River activities like fishing or angling and boating can provide a unique experience for those brought up in urban settings. You can hire a row boat on rent from the campsite and enjoy a trip down the River Great Ouse. Teach your children the names of different fish that swim and frolic in the water and you can even try your hand in throwing in a line. Campsites Cambridgeshire are incomplete without trekking and hiking facility around the vast and verdant greens. You can spend a major part of the time exploring the place and visiting neighbouring villages. Caravanning Cambridge allows you to make a trip to the prestigious Cambridge University that has nurtured many a genius mind.You can choose to stay in a tent in campsites Cambridgeshire or in motor homes or caravans. There are static caravans that you can book for your family; each one accommodates a medium-sized family. Each caravan is designed to provide utmost comfort with facility like easy access with solid steps and guide rails. There are bedrooms of varying sizes and pull-out beds in the living room. Kitchen and lounge areas are spacious. For trekking enthusiasts, caravanning Cambridge is an incredible opportunity to fulfil their wanderlust.Common facilities like laundry room, showers and toilets are provided within the caravan pitches. Motor homes or luxury caravans get gas and water supply for cooking and also electricity connection. The approach roads and driveways inside the campsites Cambridgeshire are concretized for a smooth ride even during the rain. Caravanning Cambridgeshire site also has in-house health and fitness experts who can take care of any unforeseen emergencies. You can go for organized walking tours covering neighbouring villages and towns. You will unquestionably have a memorable holiday when you choose a camping trip for your family.
